DOC.brief_summary: Retrospectively have access to MR images of patients to develop software that: 1. segment images 2. convert MR values to electron density and then 3. entered into a dose calculation system The project involves software development of data that is already available. No intervention is made at this point.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Magnetic Resonance (MR) Simulation for Treatment Planning
DOC.criteria: Subject 18 years of age and older
